name: Klee
desc: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius' confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

elemSkill.name: Jumpy Dumpty
elemSkill.desc: Jumpy Dumpty is tons of boom-bang-fun! When thrown, Jumpy Dumpty bounces thrice, igniting and dealing AoE Pyro DMG with every bounce. On the third bounce, the bomb splits into many mines. The mines will explode upon contact with opponents, or after a short period of time, dealing AoE Pyro DMG. Starts with 2 charges. Jumpy Dumpty is Klee's good friend! She can't help but introduce him to everyone.

elemBurst.name: Sparks 'n' Splash
elemBurst.desc: Klee's Blazing Delight! For the duration of this ability, continuously summons Sparks 'n' Splash to attack nearby opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.\n\nThe knights all believe that Klee must have a lucky star watching over her to have never been hurt by any of her own bombs...

attackSkill.name: Normal Attack: Kaboom!
attackSkill.desc:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Throws things that go boom when they hit things! Perform up to 3 explosive attacks, dealing <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color> to opponents after a short casting time.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Gathering the power of Pyro, Klee plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.

c13ns.name: Chained Reactions
c13ns.desc: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>'s DMG.

c13ns.name: Explosive Frags
c13ns.desc: Being hit by <color=#FFD780FF>Jumpy Dumpty</color>'s mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.

c13ns.name: Exquisite Compound
c13ns.desc: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Jumpy Dumpty</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Sparkly Explosion
c13ns.desc: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

c13ns.name: Nova Burst
c13ns.desc: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Blazing Delight
c13ns.desc: While under the effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color>, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.\nWhen <color=#FFD780FF>Sparks 'n' Splash</color> is used, all party members will gain a 10% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> for 25s.
